header.name: Sanctum of Arhun-Damodlor
header.author: BSP-Dungeon-Generator
header.description: Arhun-Damodlor is long dead, but people are still reluctant to come close to the sanctum. Recently a huge venomous werescorpion has made its home here. It is rumored that the sanctum is rich with treasures of ancient books.

game_elements.name: Item 1
game_elements.description: A mosaic, totally destroyed by fire.

game_elements.name: Item 2
game_elements.description: Remains of a warlock, a claw-shaped key in his hands.

game_elements.name: Item 3
game_elements.description: A broken chest holds a potion of vitality.

game_elements.name: Item 4
game_elements.description: A scorched gate with a keyhole to the north.

game_elements.name: Item 5
game_elements.description: A book on a lectern, allows a person to speak to the spirits when opened.
